# Mixed Reality App for Quest 3 - Industrial Valve Demonstration



Our Mixed Reality (MR) app for the Quest 3 is a cutting-edge tool designed to provide an in-depth exploration of an industrial valve's functionalities. The app combines high-fidelity 3D visualization with advanced interactive features, making it an invaluable resource for training, education, and demonstration purposes in industrial and academic settings.

Upon launching the app, users are immersed in a detailed 3D environment featuring an industrial valve. Key features include the X-Ray view, which allows users to see through the valve's outer casing and observe its internal components, and the scaling feature, which enables users to adjust the valve model's size for detailed examination or a broader overview.

![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974638_301548672926667_5802957195408246702_n.png?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LdMFo_Wg19gQ7kNvgEu9ciK&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCo-5PaJ39Yu4FDmkoZtQajbzsegKhyQcEX_HEaYEKYnw&oe=670B96F2)

The exploded view disassembles the valve into its constituent parts, allowing users to interact with and examine each component individually. Information panels provide detailed descriptions and specifications for each part, appearing contextually based on user interactions. Animation sliders allow users to visualize the valve's operation in real-time, simulating different operational states.

The user interface is designed for both macro and micro interactions, leveraging the Quest 3s hand tracking and controller capabilities for precise control. This ensures a seamless and intuitive user experience, making the app accessible to users of all skill levels.
